titles.title: A bill to revise the boundaries of certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in Delaware.
A bill to revise the boundaries of certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in Delaware.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Barrasso without amendment. With written report No. 115-149.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 214.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Power and Oceans.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the Senate reported version is repeated here.)
(Sec.1)This bill modifies certain boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Units located in Sussex County, Delaware.
